xwikidoc.name: RFCEditSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}} #set ($discard = $doc.use('RFCCode.RFCClass')) #set ($discard = $services.localization.use('document', 'RFCCode.RFCTranslations')) (% class="xform" %) ((( ; <label for="RFCCode.RFCClass_0_rfcTitle">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('rfcTitle', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('rfcTitle') ; <label for="RFCCode.RFCClass_0_category">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('category', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('category') ; <label for="RFCCode.RFCClass_0_status">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('status', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('status') ; <label for="RFCCode.RFCClass_0_abstract">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('abstract', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('abstract') ; <label for="RFCCode.RFCClass_0_content">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('content', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('content') ; <label for="RFCCode.RFCClass_0_obsoletes">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('obsoletes', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('obsoletes') ; <label for="RFCCode.RFCClass_0_additionalAuthors">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('additionalAuthors', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('additionalAuthors') ))) {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
